heroSection.title: Seamless Shift4Shop to Shopify Migrations Without the Headaches
heroSection.content:
Still stuck on Shift4Shop? We help you move to Shopify without losing sales, SEO, or sanity.
From data transfer to design recreation and app setup - we handle every detail so you can focus on growth.

processSection.subtitle: Our Process
processSection.title: How We Move You From Shift4Shop to Shopify

steps.title: Platform Audit & Planning
steps.content: We thoroughly review your existing site and map out a tailored migration plan to ensure no surprises.

steps.title: Design Recreation or Redesign
steps.content: We replicate your current design pixel-perfect on Shopify - or give your brand a complete fresh look if you prefer.

steps.title: Product & Customer Data Migration
steps.content: Your products, customers, order history, and other critical data are securely transferred without loss or errors.

steps.title: App & Feature Mapping
steps.content: We identify and configure the right Shopify apps to match or enhance your existing functionality.

steps.title: SEO Preservation
steps.content: We manage redirects, metadata, and SEO settings to protect your search rankings and organic traffic.

steps.title: Testing & Launch
steps.content: Rigorous testing across devices and browsers ensures a smooth, error-free go-live with minimal downtime.

whyChoose.subtitle: Why Choose Us
whyChoose.title: Migration Made Smooth
whyChoose.content: We combine deep Shopify expertise with proven SEO and data migration strategies, ensuring a seamless move without losing momentum.

chooseHeading.subtitle: Key Features & Benefits
chooseHeading.title: Why Brands Trust Our Migration Services

chooseContent.title: Zero Data Loss
chooseContent.content: We ensure every product, order, and customer record transfers perfectly and remains intact.

chooseContent.title: SEO-Safe Migration
chooseContent.content: Your organic rankings and traffic are preserved with careful SEO strategy and technical redirects.

chooseContent.title: Flexible Design Options
chooseContent.content: Get an exact replica of your current design or a fresh new Shopify look tailored to boost conversions.

chooseContent.title: Minimal Downtime
chooseContent.content: Your store stays online and operational during most of the migration process, avoiding lost revenue.

chooseContent.title: Post-Launch Support
chooseContent.content: We stand by your side after launch to fix any issues and optimize as your business scales.

appContent.appContent: Brands ready to move beyond limited features and scale up on a more robust, modern platform.
Businesses wanting more design and integration flexibility to support growth and marketing initiatives.
Merchants who need Shopify’s powerful app ecosystem to enhance their store’s functionality.
Companies aiming to leverage Shopify’s scalability and user-friendly management for long-term growth.

faqlist.title: Manual Data Verification
faqlist.content: We manually check migrated data to guarantee accuracy and completeness - no blind automation.

faqlist.title: Custom Redirect Strategy
faqlist.content: We create precise redirects to preserve SEO value and avoid broken links or lost pages.

faqlist.title: Shopify 2.0 Standards
faqlist.content: We build on the latest Shopify 2.0 framework for better speed, flexibility, and future-proofing.

faqlist.title: Launch Checklist & Support
faqlist.content: Every migration follows a detailed launch checklist, plus ongoing support to ensure post-launch success.
